author: SSC Admin

title: Exam Week is Here - October 1-4, 2025
content: STIers, it's exam season! Time to show the results of your hard work, late nights, and dedication. October 1-4, 2025: SHS 1st Periodical & Tertiary Midterm Exams. Exam Essentials: Ballpen, Exam Permit, Prayer, and of course, a GOOD LUCK from your fave person. 'Commit to the Lord whatever you do, and your plans will succeed.' - Proverbs 16:3. REMINDER: Review your notes, study hard, and keep growing. Whatever the result, your worth is more than grades. Good luck, STIers! Let's ace these exams together!
author: Cherry Jane Villasencio

title: Share this Lucky Coquettlog for Exams
content: Share this lucky coquettlog para iwas itlog sa Exams! As you face your exams this week STIers, here's a little sprinkle of luck. But remember, luck favors those who prepare, and we know you've done the work. So trust yourself, breathe, and let your hard work pay off.
author: Cherry Jane Villasencio

title: Donation Drive for Davao Fire Victims
content: STIers, let us extend our compassion and support. Recent fire incidents in various areas of Davao City have left several families, including some of our fellow STI College Davao students, with the total loss of their homes and belongings. The Supreme Student Council is spearheading a Donation Drive to provide aid to those affected. Donations may be dropped off at the lobby of STI College Davao. We are accepting: Clothes, Food, Hygiene Kits. Your generosity, no matter how small, will bring comfort and hope to our fellow STIers as they begin to rebuild their lives. Together, let us uphold the true spirit of bayanihan.
author: Cherry Jane Villasencio & Chester Paul Villasencio

title: Mental Health Break - October 6-12, 2025
content: Dawg, brain is officially on Airplane Mode this week â€” it's Mental Health Break! It's not just the body that gets tired â€” the mind and heart need rest too. That's why we're putting school on pause to recharge, reset, and breathe. Take this week to: Catch up on sleep, Stay hydrated, Mute the stress and toxic vibes. See you Oct 13! Still tired, pero at least well-rested tired.
author: Cherry Jane Villasencio

title: STI Cares: Brgy. 21-C Piapi Fire Victims Outreach
content: Today, the STI College Davao Supreme Student Council (SSC), together with the HTM, SHS and ICT departments, supportive teachers, and our compassionate students, reached out to the fire victims in Brgy. 21-C Piapi through a heartfelt donation drive. We sincerely thank all STIers who contributed clothes, food, and sanitary needs. Your generosity made this act of service possible and brought hope to those affected.
author: Cherry Jane Villasencio

title: National Teacher's Month Celebration
content: National Teacher's Month to all our modern-day heroes! Through your guidance, passion, and dedication, you help us reach heights we never thought possible. You inspire us to dream bigger, try harder, and believe in ourselves even when things get tough. You don't just teach lessons inside the classroomâ€”you teach life. Your passion lights the way, your support gives us strength, and your belief in us builds our confidence. You spark curiosity, shape character, and mold the leaders and dreamers of tomorrow. This Teachers' Month, we celebrate youâ€”the heroes who shape minds and inspire hearts. Your sacrifices, energy, and love never go unnoticed. You are the reason the future shines brighter. Thank you for everything you do. The world is truly better because of you.
author: Cherry Jane Villasencio

title: SSC Staff Recruitment - 10 Positions Available
content: WE'RE LOOKING FOR NEW SSC STAFF! Are you responsible, dedicated, and willing to take the initiative? The Supreme Student Council is looking for 10 passionate and reliable staff members to join our team! Be part of an organization that values teamwork, leadership, and service. This is your chance to grow, contribute, and make a difference within our STI community! Note: We will be prioritizing male applicants to help strengthen our manpower for upcoming events and activities. If you're ready to take on the challenge, send us a message or approach any SSC officer to apply!
author: SSC

title: Tagisan ng Sining: Shutter's Best Photography Competition
content: STIers, it's your time to shine! Get your gear on and show us your artistic interpretation of this school year's Tagisan ng Sining theme. SHUTTER'S BEST (Photography Competition) - THEME: BORROWED LIGHT. In what way does light transform an ordinary place into something special? Competition Date: October 15, 2025, Time: 1:00 PM - 3:00 PM, Venue: STI College Davao. You'll be using your own digital camera. This event is open to all Senior High School and Tertiary students. Registration is still open!
author: SSC

title: Class Advisory: Online Classes Oct 14-17, 2025
content: CLASS ADVISORY: Please be informed that all classes will be conducted through the Synchronous Learning Modality (Online) from October 14-17, 2025, via Microsoft Teams, following your regular class schedules. Students are advised to check their ELMS subject pages for the meeting links. Teachers may also send a direct invitation through MS Teams prior to the start of the class. Kindly ensure that you are logged in on time and ready for your sessions. Let's continue to stay engaged and make the most out of our online learning experience while ensuring everyone's safety and convenience.
author: SSC

title: STI's First-Ever Spooktacular Halloween Event 2025
content: Get ready to scream, laugh, and make history at STI's very first Halloween celebration! Join us for an afternoon of ghoulish games, thrilling booths, spooky costumes, and cinematic scares! Date: October 29, 2025 (Wednesday), Time: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM, Venue: STI Multipurpose Hall (Rooms 302-304). Department Booths: Rooms 401-403, Fright Night Cinema: Rooms 101-103. Come dressed in your spookiest, funniest, or most creative costume â€” you might just win a prize! Gather your friends, summon your school spirit, and let's make this Halloween one to remember!
author: Cherry Jane Villasencio

title: Teacher's Day Celebration - Mandatory Attendance
content: MEMORANDUM NOTICE - Heads up, STIers! Attendance for our Teacher's Day Celebration on October 24, 2025 (1:00 PM - 5:00 PM) at the STI Multipurpose Hall (Rooms 302-304) is MANDATORY for all students. Department Secretaries and Class Presidents will monitor attendance, so make sure to be present and on time. Let's all take part in honoring our amazing teachers and making this celebration a success!
author: SSC

title: Teacher's Day Dress Code Advisory
content: Dress Code Advisory for Teacher's Day Celebration on October 24, 2025. You are encouraged and authorized to wear any official STI-branded shirt or uniform top, such as your PE, NYC, or NSTP shirts. IMPORTANT EXCEPTION: Departmental shirts or any attire specifically tied to an individual program (e.g., IT, HTM, and SHS) are not permitted for this celebration. Please ensure you wear a general, non-departmental STI shirt or a standard uniform top to comply with the event dress code. Thank you for your cooperation in making this a unifying and successful tribute to our esteemed educators and staff!
author: SSC

title: Fright Icon 2025 Registration Now Open
content: FRIGHT ICON 2025 REGISTRATION IS NOW OPEN! Are you ready to unleash your spooky side and claim the title of STI's Spooktacular Fright Icon 2025? Show off your most haunting, creative, and jaw-dropping costume this Halloween and own the stage! Date: October 29, 2025, Venue: STI MultiPurpose Hall (302-303). Register now by answering our official Google Form or message the SSC Facebook Page for inquiries. Dare to scare. Be iconic. Be legendary.
author: Cherry Jane Villasencio & Chester Paul Villasencio

title: Spooktacular Event Room Assignments & Reminders
content: Please be guided by the room assignments and important reminders for today's event. Room Assignments: Cinema (Room 101), Attendance (Room 301), Time-In: 11:00 AM - 12:30 PM, Time-Out: 5:00 PM, Fright Icon Contest: Rooms 302-304 (Multipurpose Hall), Department Booths: 401 (ICT), 402 (SHS), 403 (HTM). REMINDERS: Kindly observe the proper dress code. Students wearing revealing outfits will not be allowed to enter the school premises. Let's maintain respect and professionalism while enjoying today's spooky celebration!
author: Cherry Jane Villasencio

title: No Classes: October 31 & November 1 (All Saints' Day)
content: Heads up, STIers! In accordance with Proclamation No. 727 issued by MalacaÃ±ang, please be informed that there will be no classes and no office transactions on October 31, 2025, and November 1, 2025 (All Saints' Day) in observance of these special non-working holidays. Let us take this time to honor and remember our dearly departed. Regular classes and office operations will resume on Monday, November 3, 2025. Stay safe, cherish the break, and enjoy the long weekend!
author: SSC

title: 2025 Earthquake Drill - Safety & Preparedness
content: STIers united once again â€” this time for safety and preparedness! The 2025 Earthquake Drill brought the entire STI community together to strengthen our awareness, teamwork, and readiness in times of emergencies. The drill served as a vital reminder that disaster preparedness is not just a routine â€” it's a responsibility that can save lives. From the sound of the alarm to the execution of evacuation procedures, every student, faculty, and staff member showed discipline, cooperation, and a strong sense of unity. Through this activity, we continue to promote a culture of safety, awareness, and collective responsibility. Together, we stand strong, prepared, and united!
author: SSC

title: Search for Queen STI 2025 - Registration Open
content: The Search for the First-Ever Queen STI 2025 Begins! Are you ready to shine, slay, and own the spotlight? We're looking for confident, fierce, and fabulous contestants to compete for the crown of the first-ever Queen STI 2025 â€” exclusive only for transgender women and gay students! If you've got the beauty, brains, and charisma to rule the stage, this is your moment to make history! To register, you may approach any SSC Officer or visit the SSC Office. Who will be crowned the first-ever Queen STI 2025? It could be YOU!
author: SSC

title: STI TIGI-AY 2025 is Coming!
content: STI TIGI-AY 2025: THE SPIRIT UNLEASHED! The wait is finally over â€” it's time to reignite the flame of unity, talent, and school pride! This is where strength meets passion, and every STIer shines with excellence. From electrifying competitions to spectacular performances, TIGI-AY 2025 will bring out the best in every heart that beats for STI! The stage is set. The cheers are loud. The spirit is unstoppable. STI TIGI-AY season is coming â€” are you ready to rise?
author: SSC

title: TIGI-AY 2025 Theme: Igniting Talents, Showcasing Excellence
content: Prepare to be amazed by a vibrant showcase of culture, creativity, and unity! We're excited to announce STI TIGI-AY 2025 with the theme 'Igniting Talents, Showcasing Excellence.' This year's celebration will shine a spotlight on the incredible talents and artistry of our STIers as we come together to celebrate culture, collaboration, and camaraderie. Expect breathtaking performances, colorful presentations, and unforgettable moments that embody true STI pride! Registration is now open! Contact your Department Officer or Coordinator to register. Inquiries are welcome; you may contact any SSC Officer or message us directly.
author: SSC

title: Important: SSC Does Not Collect Student Payments
content: IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT FROM SSC: Good day, STIers! For everyone's information, the Supreme Student Council (SSC) is NOT ALLOWED to collect any form of payment from students. Please be reminded that your respective departments and the SSC are separate working organizations. Any contributions, fees, or payments requested by your department are NOT connected to the SSC, and we are NOT INVOLVED in such collections. We kindly ask everyone to refrain from spreading false or unclear information that may negatively affect the council's name. Rest assured, we strictly follow all bylaws and regulations in everything we do. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation! Let's continue to uphold transparency and teamwork as we look forward to an exciting Intramurals!
author: SSC

title: Welcome Teams: Dragon Vanguard (SHS)
content: Welcome Teams! We're beyond excited to kick off STI TIGI-AY 2025! A huge shoutout to the Dragon Vanguard from SHS Departmentâ€”get ready to bring the heat, unleash your strength, and showcase your incredible skills! Wishing the Dragon Vanguard an unforgettable intramurals filled with teamwork, determination, and fiery competition. Good luck, warriors! Let the games begin!
author: SSC

title: Welcome Teams: Pegasus Fury (THM)
content: Welcome Teams! We're excited to have you all join us for STI TIGI-AY 2025! A big shoutout to Pegasus Fury from THM Departmentâ€”get ready to soar to new heights, showcase your skills, and take the competition by storm! Wishing Pegasus Fury an incredible intramurals filled with teamwork, determination, and unforgettable moments. Good luck, warriors! Let the games begin!
author: SSC

title: Welcome Teams: Phoenix Invictus (ICT)
content: Welcome Teams! We're excited to have you all join us for STI TIGI-AY 2025! A huge shoutout to Phoenix Invictus from ICT Departmentâ€”get ready to rise stronger from every challenge and set the arena ablaze with your fiery spirit! Wishing Phoenix Invictus an unforgettable intramurals filled with teamwork, determination, and intense competition. Good luck, warriors! Let the games begin!
author: SSC

title: Parol Making Contest 2025 - Recycled Materials
content: Christmas has arrived at STI! Our three departments are once again showcasing their unity, creativity, and holiday spirit through this year's Parol Making Contest. Each parol is proudly crafted using recycled and reusable materialsâ€”proving that imagination shines even brighter when paired with sustainability. Let's support our participants as they transform simple, discarded items into meaningful symbols of light and hope. Which department will illuminate the season with the brightest and most innovative parol? Stay tuned and let the holiday glow begin!
author: Cherry Jane Villasencio

title: TikTok Dance Competition - STI Tigi-ay Music
content: Our TikTok Dance Competition featuring the catchy STI Tigi-ay music is officially ON! Bring your energy, creativity, and school spirit as you vibe to the beat and showcase your best dance moves. Let's make this challenge loud, fun, and unforgettable! For registration or submission of your entry, you may message the SSC Facebook Page. Who will own the spotlight? Let the rhythm decide!
author: Cherry Jane Villasencio

title: Good Luck STIers in Your Exams!
content: Good luck STIers in your exams! No worries too much ha, your STI family is cheering for you. You worked hard all semester â€” now trust yourself, breathe, and answer with confidence. Kaya kayo nah! Best of luck, mga pasadong students!
author: SSC

title: SSC Clearance Signing Requirements & Schedule
content: ANNOUNCEMENT FROM SSC - CLEARANCE SIGNING: Good day, STIers! Please be informed that SSC Clearance Signing will not start before December 11, which is also the last day of Intramurals. However, if you know that you have absences or were late in the following events (Talent Search, Spooktacular Event, Intramurals Day 1, Intramurals Day 3), you will be required to donate â‚±50 worth of school supplies for each day you were absent or late. These school supplies will be used for our upcoming Outreach Programs. Required School Supplies per â‚±50 Set: 1 Notebook, 1 Crayola (small pack), 1 Ballpen, 1 Pencil, 1 Sharpener, 1 Plastic Envelope. Reminder: If you missed two past events, you must provide two sets of the required supplies. Thank you for your cooperation and continued support for our community efforts!
author: SSC

title: Intramurals Schedule & Guidelines
content: Get ready, STIersâ€”Intramurals Day 1 is on! The action begins on December 9 at 1PM at the STI Campus, and we'll be live-streaming all matches so you can follow the excitement wherever you are!
author: SSC

title: Magsaysay Park Do's and Don'ts
content: Please be guided by the Do's and Don'ts of Magsaysay Park. Let's maintain cleanliness, safety, and order as we enjoy this public space. Thank you for your cooperation.
author: SSC

title: TIGI-AY 2025 Day 1 - D-Day is Here!
content: D-DAY is here! The wait is over. The cheers grow louder. The spirit burns brighter. Today, we rise, we compete, and we carry the pride of STI with every move. Give your all, play with heartâ€”Tigi-Ay 2025 starts NOW!
author: SSC

title: TIGI-AY 2025 Day 1 Results
content: DAY 1 RESULTS ARE IN! Tigi-ayyyyy pa rin! Our athletes came in strong, fought hard, and delivered an explosive start to TIGI-AY 2025! From major activities like Queen STI, CODM, MLBB, and Cheer Dances, to minor activities such as Board Games, Mindgames, Larong Pinoy, and Creative Challengesâ€”STIers showed unmatched energy and teamwork across every event! Swipe to see our Champion, 2nd Place, and 3rd Place teams who dominated today's games and proved what true STI spirit looks like!
author: SSC

title: TIGI-AY 2025 Initial Tally After Day 1
content: INITIAL TALLY IS OUT! Day 1 pa lang pero ramdam na ang init ng laban! Here's the current leaderboard based on today's game results â€” but anything can still change! Teams, keep the momentum. Supporters, keep the energy. TIGI-AY 2025 is just getting started!
author: SSC

title: TIGI-AY 2025 Day 2 Results
content: DAY 2 RESULTS ARE HERE! Tigi-ayyyy, STI! Day 2 came in hotter, louder, and more intense as our athletes pushed their limits and delivered another round of solid wins for TIGI-AY 2025! From high-energy court battles to strategic mind games and creative showcases, STIers proved once again that grit, passion, and teamwork run in our blood! Swipe to see today's Champion, 2nd Place, and 3rd Place teams who stood out, dominated their events, and showed the true meaning of STI excellence!
author: SSC

title: TIGI-AY 2025 Final Tally - Overall Champions
content: FINAL TALLY â€” DAYS 1 TO 3: The results are in, STIers! After three days of intense competition, teamwork, and unstoppable energy, here are your official Intramurals Champions: OVERALL CHAMPION: Pegasus Fury (THM Department), 1ST RUNNER-UP: Phoenix Invictus (ICT Department), 2ND RUNNER-UP: Dragon Vanguard (SHS Department). Congratulations to all departments for giving your best and showing true Tigi-Ay spirit! Win or lose, every cheer, every play, and every moment made this intramurals unforgettable.
author: SSC

title: Clearance Signing Schedule: Dec 15-17, 2025
content: ANNOUNCEMENT: CLEARANCE SIGNING SCHEDULE - The SSC will officially start signing clearances on Monday to Wednesday â€” December 15 to 17, 2025, from 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM. Please prepare your requirements and have your forms ready to avoid delays. The next clearance signing will be scheduled on the second week of January. Have a good sem break, everyone! For any concerns, feel free to message the SSC page.
author: SSC

title: Merry Christmas from SSC!
content: All wrapped up in Christmas cheer! From the SSC family to yours, may this season be filled with joy, laughter, and moments that matter.
author: SSC

title: Happy New Year 2026 from SSC!
content: Happy New Year, STIers! Wishing you a year full of prosperity and happiness this year 2026 from SSC Fam.
author: SSC

title: Clearance Signing: Mon/Wed/Fri 10:30 AM - 2:00 PM
content: ANNOUNCEMENT: Please be informed that the clearance signing will be conducted every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday, from 10:30 AM to 2:00 PM only. Kindly note that the room assignment will be announced later (TBA), as it will depend on room availability on the said dates. Further updates will be posted once the room has been finalized. We encourage everyone to follow the given schedule and wait for further announcements. Thank you for your cooperation.
author: SSC

title: 2nd Semester Enrollment Starts January 5, 2026
content: Heads Up STIers! Enrollment starts on Monday! For the Transferees and Old students, please be informed of the enrollment process for the 2nd Semester of AY 2025-2026. Schedules of Enrollment for Old students: SHS - January 5-17, 2026 (Grade 11 & 12), TERTIARY - January 5-10, 2026 (1st & 2nd Year), January 12-17, 2026 (3rd & 4th Year). Class starts on January 19, 2026.
author: SSC

title: First Semester Recap - Countless Memories
content: One semester. Countless memories. The first semester was a journey filled with learning, laughter, challenges, and victoriesâ€”both inside and outside the classroom. From academic activities and campus programs to events that brought us together as one community, every moment reflected the passion, dedication, and teamwork of our students and organizers. Each event became an opportunity to grow, build confidence, and create lasting connections. As we look back on these highlights, we celebrate not just what we accomplished, but the memories we shared and the experiences that shaped us this semester. Here's a recap of the moments that made our first semester truly unforgettable!
author: SSC

title: Byaheng Isang Sem Na Lang
content: Byaheng isang sem na langâ€¦ another year na naman of pagod, puyat, at pangarap. Sa bawat late night, bawat breakdown, at bawat pagdududa sa sarili, pinili pa rin nating magpatuloy. Hindi man araw-araw strong, pero araw-araw lumalaban. Konti na lang, kakayanin pa â€” para sa mga pangarap na matagal na nating hinahawakan. ğŸ¤âœ¨
author: SSC

content: Countdown is REAL â³ Back to school in 3 days! Let's gooo!

title: SSC Website Now Open to All Students
content: The SSC website is now open to all students. Access the list of SSC events, view the official Intramurals tally, and get to know the SSC officers. The website is accessible on Desktop, Tablet, and Mobile devices.

title: 2 Days Countdown - Back to School!
content: 2 days na lang, STIers! ğŸ“– Bakasyon is waving goodbye, syllabus is waving hello. Ready na ba?
